sub_title: Mentor to leaders creating resilient organizations. I make boring business notes fun!
summary:
I am an Agile Trainer & Management Consultant and a mentor to leaders creating resilient organizations. I have a strong background in IT with experience in almost every role. I take great pride in my work, and it shows in the recommendations I have received over the years.

As a Certified Scrum Master, Professional Scrum Master, Certified Scrum Product Owner, Certified Agile Master, SAFe Program Consultant, Agile Master Assessor, IPMA Agile Assessor, and PRINCE2 Practitioner, I strive to merge classic and Agile management in the conviction that it is the future of professional management.

As a Professional Scrum Trainer and SAFe Program Consultant, I help to improve the profession of software delivery as well as marketing, human resources, and finance. I bring my experience in enterprise IT since 1999 and on Scrum Teams since 2006 to my teaching, am a driving force in the Agile community, and a sought-after speaker at conferences and events. 

I am a professional enthusiast when it comes to hand lettering, sketchnoting, graphic recording, podcasting, and writing. I have tried to attain work-life balance only to discover work-life swirling suits me better.

I am fluent in Dutch, English, and Spanish, and speak passable French and German.

I live in Dordrecht, The Netherlands, with my wife Nienke and son Mark.

projects.title: Agile transition at Rabo International
projects.description:
Laurens Bonnema is one of the Agile coaches supporting the transformation to Agile with the ICT-department. This means that he is responsible for:

1.	Coaching and training the teams and the organization with the transition from ‘doing-agile’ (just following the Agile protocol after following a training) to ‘being’-agile’ (incorporating agile in the culture of the team and organisation, help them using the new skills in practice specific for their situation). 
2.	Marketing and communication material like flyers, presentations, best practices
3.	Make thema-based material (risk management, Business and IT alignment)  to support the Process Engineer team

profile_positions.title: Professional Scrum Trainer

profile_positions.description: Bonnema.ink helps people visualize their ideas through sketchnoting, graphic recording, and videoscribing so they can communicate those ideas more effectively, help each other to solve problems, and have lots of fun. We also help people get started with sketchnoting, graphic recording, and videoscribing, and hone their craft to perfection to increase their impact with memorable notes that others will want to copy.
profile_positions.title: Graphic Facilitator

profile_positions.description:
- Chairman of Program Group for Agile Project Management. 
- Bid Manager for several bids. 
- Project Manager responsible for a large scale software development project at Postkantoren, the Dutch Post Offices, to implement a new point-of-sale system.
- Interim Team Manager responsible for the realisation of a new railtraffic control system (VKL) for ProRail, the Dutch railinfra company. 
- Project Manager responsible for the implementation of a new corporate intranet (1net) at Achmea, a large Dutch finance and care company.
- Project Manager responsible for the further development of DigiD, the system shared between cooperating Dutch governmental agencies, allowing to digitally authenticate the identity of a person who applies for a transaction service via internet.
- Project Manager responsible for several projects within Atos Origin's SDMC. Worked closely with Software Architects and SDMC Management to create and implement Lean Software Development at Atos Origin and her clients.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

NLScrum is a community open for anyone wanting to share knowledge and experience with Scrum. Join today and we hope to see you at our next Meetup! NLScrum hosts regular sessions on Scrum such as Open Space events, workshops and keynotes.

On our Meetup site you can find: - Mailing lists - Information on Scrum gatherings - Pictures of our events. NLScrum is the official Dutch Chapter of the Scrum Alliance, visit their website at http://scrumalliance.org

company.name: NL Sketchnoting, Graphic Recording & Visual Thinking

volunteer_experiences.description: A Meetup group for all sketchnoters, graphic recorders/facilitators, and visual thinkers in The Netherlands. Open to both professionals and enthusiasts. Love to draw, doodle, sketch, or paint? Looking for your peers or potential mentors? Join us! You've never been met like this before!
